alert.note: Alert for Bent; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 3:21PM MDT until June 12 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 320 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Two Buttes Reservoir, or 20 miles northwest of Springfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. Other thunderstorms continue to develop in the warning area. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lamar, Two Buttes Reservoir, John Martin Reservoir and Caddoa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
